overview: Who needs a horse to go riding when you've go a handsome stable boy who is as horny as hell and needs no saddle to ride his willing stallion, 'cos he likes to do his riding bareback. Taking a leaf out of Christian Grey's bible, two hot twinks break out the collar and cuffs and enjoy some raw and dominating sex and four smooth young men take their time as they make out with each other and enjoy some four-way boy fun. There are those players who just enjoy the game, and then there's those Bareback Players who enjoy so much more!
title: Bareback Players
